title: 148864436.a Red Flag For Copy Pasting
excerpt: If Google decided to penalize every blog that contained the word “delve” in the intro, every content writer in the world would be screwed.

children.text: If Google decided to penalize every blog that contained the word “delve” in the intro, every content writer in the world would be screwed.
That’s because ChatGPT has a tendency to overuse and abuse it.
Despite the fact that no human, to the best of my knowledge, actually uses the word.

It’s a simple way to weed out real writers from the ai-abusers. And it’s a good reminder that even artifically-generated text is going to be read and evaluated by real people (or, at least by algorithms trained to mimic them.)
Let's leave "delve" to the dictionary and out of writing for the web.
